10px;padding: 12px 12px 3px;height: 42px;border-radius: 5px;cursor: pointer;-webkit-transition: height .5s,padding .5s;transition: height .5s,padding .5s}.grid-list .pager .pager-link{padding: 12px 0 3px;min-width: 44px;text-align: center}.lv2-series-row-item .lv2-item-actions .lv2-item-action-row .lv2-row-item-detail{margin-left: 5px}.lv2-book-row-item{padding-left: 10px;padding-right: 10px}.flat-nav .main-menu{margin: -1px 0 0}.main-menu li ul li a{padding: 0 6px}.desktop .flat-nav .main-menu li:first-child,.flat-nav .primary_navigation_canvas input.search,.lv2-row-list .lv2-list-content{margin: 0}.list-container .content-info .action-button-container{margin-top: 10px}.amazon-button .amazon-button-inner,.store-btn.amazon-button .amazon-button-inner{-webkit-box-shadow: none;box-shadow: none}.utilities .emptyCart{padding: 20px 0 0}#messagesContainer ul{max-width: 1066px}#messageAlert,.lv2-message-error,.lv2-message-info,.lv2-message-success{padding: 10px 0}#messagesContainer li{background-size: 22px}.desktop .lv2-list-action-options-container,.lv2-ui-item.lv2-layout-menu .lv2-list-action-options-container{padding: 4px 0}.desktop .lv2-book-item.lv2-selected-item .lv2-overlay:hover,.desktop .lv2-book-micro-item.lv2-selected-item .lv2-overlay:hover,.desktop .lv2-book-row-item.lv2-selected-item .lv2-overlay:hover,.desktop .lv2-selected-item.lv2-slider-more .lv2-overlay:hover,.lv2-book-item.lv2-selected-item .lv2-overlay,.lv2-book-micro-item.lv2-selected-item .lv2-overlay,.lv2-book-row-item.lv2-selected-item .lv2-overlay,.lv2-selected-item.lv2-slider-more .lv2-overlay{opacity: .5}.community-section .title,.section-title .title{padding-bottom: 4px}#checkoutSuggested{padding-top: 0}#checkoutSuggested h2,#checkoutSuggestedSeries img{padding-left: 10px}#yourPurchasesNote{padding: 10px 10px 0}#yourPurchasesNote .read-container{padding-right: 0}.desktop .secondary-navigation li a:hover,.secondary-navigation li.sel a{border-bottom-width: 2px}.errorMessage:before,.formErrorMessage:before{margin: 0 8px 0 0}#cookieAcknowledgement{border-top: #424242 solid 2px;background: #212121}#cookieAcknowledgement #cookieAcknowledged{filter: invert(1)}#login .inputs,#register .inputs{border: 1px solid #424242}
